text:
Benefitter (http://www.benefitter.com) - San Francisco, CA

(Full Time/Intern/Remote/H1B)

Join the rest of our team in our well funded 1 year old startup. Benefitter helps companies in the US move to a ACA/Obamacare based benefits package. Turns out that for most people this is a win/win situation.

Engineer positions

- Developer: full-stack with a strong analytics/math background. - QA: Someone to build a 100% automated test system. We're not anywhere close to that now.

We're mostly a Rails and Selenium shop, but could care less if you have that experience. We're working on a big and challenging problem and are looking for great people to join our team. No jerks please.

jobs@benefitter.com
